name: Prana Ulterior Slim Pants - Men's
description:
Perfect when you want something as comfortable as jeans, but just a little different. The Ulterior pants offer a familiar comfort, in an evolved style.Organic cotton and polyester blend with just enough spandex for a comfortable stretch.Classic 5-pocket layout lets you keep everything just where you like it.Slim fit bridges the middle ground between style and comfort.
